pullRequest.title: about page fix
pullRequest.bodyText:
Create links if the user has access to descriptors with Global context otherwise list them.
If the user has no access to providers don't show the table.

commit.message: fix: create links for channels if there are global descriptors.

nodes.bodyText: Should this be done in the else statement? It doesn't look like it's used anywhere else.

commit.message: refactor: Move a line of code based on PR feedback.
